title: Sweet scones with coconut cream and pink peppercorn pineapple jam
description: There are many opinions about how to serve scones, but when you love a scone, who cares how you eat it? To prove my point, I’ve gone for a re-invention of the classic, with whipped coconut cream instead of clotted cream and fragrant pineapple jam instead of strawberry.
ingredients: 350g/12oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
185ml/6fl oz whole milk, plus extra for glazing
